name: @knockdog/bridge-native
description: Native bridge for React Native WebView communication

scripts.build: pnpm exec bunchee src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --out-dir dist --external react-native-webview && pnpm exec tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist
scripts.dev: pnpm exec bunchee src/index.ts --watch --format cjs,esm --dts --out-dir dist --external react-native-webview
